short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight selected text in webpages, add notes and visit the webpage again to see highlighted text and saved notes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🖍️ 𝗪𝗲𝗯 𝗣𝗮𝗴𝗲 𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗵𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝗲𝗿: Easily highlight text and add notes to any webpage!
💡 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗜𝘁 𝗪𝗼𝗿𝗸𝘀:
 𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗵𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁 𝘀𝗲𝗹𝗲𝗰𝘁𝗲𝗱 𝘁𝗲𝘅𝘁  on a webpage and save it to view whenever you revisit the page.
Add 𝗽𝗲𝗿𝘀𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗹 𝗻𝗼𝘁𝗲𝘀 to highlighted sections and access them later with ease.
⚡ 𝗤𝘂𝗶𝗰𝗸 𝗦𝗵𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗰𝘂𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗵𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴
 𝗤𝘂𝗶𝗰𝗸 𝗦𝗵𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗰𝘂𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝘁𝗮𝗻𝘁 𝗛𝗶𝗴𝗵𝗹𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝗶𝗻𝗴:
Windows: Press Ctrl + Shift + 2
📝 𝗔𝗱𝗱 𝗡𝗼𝘁𝗲𝘀 𝗘𝗳𝗳𝗼𝗿𝘁𝗹𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗹𝘆:
Use the pop-up to add new notes when saving your highlights.
Mac: Press Cmd + Shift + 4 for a quick note.
Windows: Press Ctrl + Shift + 4 to add a note instantly.
With Web Page Highlighter, never lose track of important information again! 🚀
